Trade/Device Name(s): cobas SARS-CoV-2 Qualitative for use on the cobas 5800/6800/8800 Systems
Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas SARS-CoV-2 Qualitative real-time RT-PCR assay for detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on cobas 5800/6800/8800 platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2 in nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic individuals and anterior nasal swabs from any individuals, used in conjunction with clinical assessment.
